channel.title: Deployments on ownCloud
channel.description: Recent content in Deployments on ownCloud

item.title: Deploy as an app in ownCloud 10
item.description: Prerequisites Deploying ownCloud Web Configure oauth2 Configure ownCloud 10 Configure ownCloud Web Accessing ownCloud Web One of the build artifacts of the ownCloud Web is a ownCloud 10 app bundle. Prerequisites Running ownCloud 10 server with version 10.6 Installed oauth2 app Deploying ownCloud Web To download the ownCloud Web, go to https://github.com/owncloud/phoenix/releases and pick your desired version. In the release, you will find a file called phoenix-app.
